ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Subscription Problems
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Don t feel too bad, I ordered on the first day it was possible to order. They didn t charge my credit card until the 15th and then I didn t get an email
ygData.messageBody:
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Olmoss@... [mailto:Olmoss@...]

> Gimme a hand, I am girdding for war. Wasn't the Monday after it came
> out April 10th ? Or the third ? AND any of you in the same boat ?


Don't feel too bad, I ordered on the first day it was possible to order.
They didn't charge my credit card until the 15th and then I didn't get an
email confirmation until 11:18 this morning.

*sigh*

If I don't have it Monday morning I'm cancelling and buying the retail copy.
After paying for next day shipping its only an extra $8....

Anthem Dirgemaker
Level 50 bard of Qeynos
Solusek Ro
